mapper.select: SELECT req.supplier_name FROM t_req_bill_tmp req, t_supplier sup WHERE req.batch_id = #{batchId} and req.supplier_name = sup.name GROUP BY req.supplier_name ORDER BY sup._index asc

SELECT good1.pos_qty AS pos_qty1 , good2.pos_qty AS pos_qty2 , good3.pos_qty AS pos_qty3 , good4.pos_qty AS pos_qty4 , sd.stock_qty , bill.app_num , bill.product_no , bill.barcode , bill.batch_id , bill._index , bill.inventory_num , bill.org_id , bill.product_name , bill.product_no , bill.ref_price , bill.remarks , bill.supplier_name FROM t_req_bill_tmp bill LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_1 good1 ON bill.barcode = good1.item_barcode AND bill.org_id = good1.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_2 good2 ON bill.barcode = good2.item_barcode AND bill.org_id = good2.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_3 good3 ON bill.barcode = good3.item_barcode AND bill.org_id = good3.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_4 good4 ON bill.barcode = good4.item_barcode AND bill.org_id = good4.org_id LEFT JOIN t_store_detail sd ON bill.barcode = sd.item_barcode AND bill.org_id = sd.org_id AND sd.opt_date = #{optDate} WHERE batch_id = #{batchId} AND supplier_name = #{supplierName} ORDER BY org_id

SELECT bill.batch_id , bill.supplier_name, bill.barcode , bill.product_no, bill.product_name , bill.ref_price , SUM(bill.app_num) AS app_num , stock_qty AS stock_qty , pos_qty_total AS pos_qty_total FROM t_req_bill_tmp bill LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(stock_qty) AS stock_qty, item_barcode FROM t_store_detail_one_day store GROUP BY item_barcode ) _store ON bill.barcode = _store.item_barcode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(good.pos_qty) AS pos_qty_total, item_barcode FROM t_sales_day_total_goods good WHERE opt_date >= #{optDate} GROUP BY item_barcode ) _good ON bill.barcode = _good.item_barcode WHERE bill.batch_id = #{batchId} AND bill.supplier_name = #{supplierName} GROUP BY barcode ORDER BY barcode
